title: Tube Filling From 12-row Trough
author: Opentrons
description: With this protocol, your robot can transfer solution from well A1 of the 12-column trough to up to 216 1.5 mL tubes. This protocol requires a P300 single-channel pipette.
process:
Input the number of tubes you are planning to fill.
Select the tube rack you are using.
Input the desired volume to be transferred in each tube.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Tube Filling From 12-row Trough
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: With this protocol, your robot can transfer solution from well A1 of the 12-column trough to up to 216 1.5 mL tubes. This protocol requires a P300 single-channel pipette.
markdown.process:
1. Input the number of tubes you are planning to fill.
2. Select the tube rack you are using.
3. Input the desired volume to be transferred in each tube.
4. Download your protocol.
5. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
6. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
7. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
8. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
